//health care chaplain assessment activity Health-Care Chaplain Preliminary Assessment Do you have any significant health/medical issues? If any, what is/are the health issue(s)? Do you have any history of psychological issues? Please choose the psychological issues/concern(s) that you currently have Do you feel the incident/issue that you are currently experiencing is preventing you from fulfilling your physical and spiritual responsibilities? Is there any meaningful resource or an authority or a person with whom/where you look for guidance when you face doubt, confusion, tragedy, or conflict? Where do you find meaning and a source for strength in times of difficulty?

//community humanist Chaplain pre assessment activity Community-Humanist Chaplaincy Preliminary Assessment Chaplains provide emotional and spiritual support; however, chaplains are not licensed therapists nor physicians and are not able to diagnose patients or prescribe medication or provide treatment What reason/need brings you in today? Your answer… Do you have any significant health/medical and psychological issues? Yes No Do you feel this health/medical or psychological issue that you are currently experiencing is preventing you from fulfilling your physical and spiritual responsibilities? What are the issues (if any) that you are currently experiencing within your family? What are the issues (if any) that you are currently experiencing within your social environment? How do you define your role within your family and/or social environment? Where do you find meaning and a source for strength in times of difficulty? Are you experiencing challenges that Affect your belief and relationship with the Divine? Result in a change in your rituals and practice? Are you a part of a spiritual/religious/social community that shares your belief, meaning in life, ritual, or practice? What are the top 3 emotions you are recently experiencing the most? Your Answer… What is your answer?

//get in touch page Get in touch Your Name Your Email Address You Want to Talk About… Your Message Send Message MESSAGE IS SENT Please Write your name Please Write your mail address Please Write message topic Please Write your message Your message is sent successfully Sorry, your message could not be sent. //notifications Your Application is Accepted Hi, We would like to inform you about your application. We look into your application and confirmed your profile. Now, you can enter your available time and take patient.
Your Appointment is Cancelled by Chaplain Hi, We regret to inform you that your appointment is canceled by Chaplain. In some cases, such cancellations may occur. Cancellation is usually due to a Chaplain\'s emergency situation. Your payment will be send to your credit card. If you want, you can make another appointment.
Your Appointment is Canceled by Chaplain Hi, We regret to inform you that your appointment is canceled by Chaplain. In some cases, such cancellations may occur. Cancellation is usually due to a Chaplain\'s emergency situation. Your payment will be send to your credit card. If you want, you can make another appointment. \nCanceled appointment info: \nCanceled appointment Date: \n%1$s \nCanceled appointment Time: \n%2$s \nChaplain Name: \n%3$s \nPatient Name: \n%4$s \nAppointment Price: \n%5$s $
Your Appointment is Cancelled Hi, Your appointment is canceled. \nCanceled appointment info: \nCanceled appointment Date: \n%1$s \nCanceled appointment Time: \n%2$s \nChaplain Name: \n%3$s \nPatient Name: \n%4$s \nAppointment Price: \n%5$s $
Your Appointment is Cancelled by Patient Hi, We regret to inform you that your appointment is canceled by Patient. In some cases, such cancellations may occur. Cancellation is usually due to a Patient\'s emergency situation. Your available times are updated after this cancellation. New patients can make a new appointment for that time.
Your Appointment is Edited by Patient Hi, One of your appointment date is edited by patient. You can check your new appointment date in the future appointments page.
You have a new appointment Hi, We would like to inform you that you have a new appointment. You can check your new appointment info in the future appointments page.
You have a new appointment Hi, We would like to inform you that you have a new appointment. \nAppointment info: \nAppointment Date: \n%1$s \nChaplain Name: \n%2$s \nPatient Name: \n%3$s \nAppointment Price: \n%4$s $
Your appointment is canceled Hi, Your appointment is canceled. \nCanceled appointment info: \nCanceled appointment Date: \n%1$s \nCanceled appointment Time: \n%2$s \nChaplain Name: \n%3$s \nPatient Name: \n%4$s \nAppointment Price: \n%5$s $
One of your appointment is canceled by patient Hi, We regret to inform you that One of your appointment is canceled by patient. \nCanceled appointment info: \nCanceled appointment Date: \n%1$s \nCanceled appointment Time: \n%2$s \nChaplain Name: \n%3$s \nPatient Name: \n%4$s \nAppointment Price: \n%5$s $
Your appointment date is changed Hi, Your appointment date is changed. \nNew appointment info: \nNew appointment Date: \n%1$s \nNew appointment Time: \n%2$s \nChaplain Name: \n%3$s \nPatient Name: \n%4$s
One of your appointments date is changed by patient Hi, One of your appointments date is changed by patient. \nNew appointment info: \nNew appointment Date: \n%1$s \nNew appointment Time: \n%2$s \nChaplain Name: \n%3$s \nPatient Name: \n%4$s
Chaplain write a note after your appointment Hi, We would like to inform you that Chaplain write a note after your appointment. You can see Chaplain note in the past appointments page.
